name: hot_products
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool aliexpress_true_api.
Tool description: Fetching data from AliExpress instantly using an powerful oracle server. If there will be high demand, I will set up multiple servers in different regions with a load balancer to ensure fast and reliable service. Rest assured, the service will be fast and reliable with no down times.
API description: Get hot products by search value, you can set maximum search price too. You will get up to 50 results.

search_value.description: The search term used to find hot products on AliExpress.

max_price.description: The maximum price for the product searches. Defaults to 10000.
